name: Anchor Coverage Audit 1 - Intent Space Analysis
focus: quantify known vs unknown intent space

purpose.description: Measure the coverage of semantic anchors across the intent space
questions: What percentage of possible intents are covered by known patterns?
What is the growth rate of coverage over time?

outputs.covered_space_percent: Percentage of intent space covered by known patterns
outputs.unknown_space_percent: Percentage of intent space that is unknown
outputs.growth_rate: Rate of coverage growth per version

methodology.step_3: Estimate unknown space based on OOD sample classification
